channel.title: Man Like Politics
channel.itunes:subtitle: The podcast about Politics
channel.itunes:author: Furnisha Lycett, Pouneh Ahari, Marley McIntosh
channel.itunes:summary: The Man Like Politics podcast brings political discussions to the everyday listener. Covering everything from the political influence of pop-culture to discussions on nuclear weapons, if it's got a political influence, we're here for it! Produced and hosted by Pouneh Ahari, Camarley McIntosh and Furnisha Lycett, this podcast is here to bring fresh discussions to the UK political scene.
channel.description: The Man Like Politics podcast brings political discussions to the everyday listener. Covering everything from the political influence of pop-culture to discussions on nuclear weapons, if it's got a political influence, we're here for it! Produced and hosted by Pouneh Ahari, Camarley McIntosh and Furnisha Lycett, this podcast is here to bring fresh discussions to the UK political scene.

item.itunes:title: Nuclear Weapons
item.title: Nuclear Weapons
item.itunes:author: Furnisha Lycett, Pouneh Ahari, Marley McIntosh
item.itunes:subtitle: Nuclear Weapons
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we discuss the controversial topic of nuclear weapons and their relevance in today's society.
item.description: In this episode we discuss the controversial topic of nuclear weapons and their relevance in today's society.
item.content:encoded: In this episode we discuss the controversial topic of nuclear weapons and their relevance in today's society.

item.itunes:title: Blockchain & Cryptocurrency
item.title: Blockchain & Cryptocurrency
item.itunes:author: Furnisha Lycett, Pouneh Ahari, Marley McIntosh
item.itunes:subtitle: Blockchain & Cryptocurrency
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we discuss the blockchain and cyrptocurrency craze: What are cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology? We discuss the alternative uses of blockchain and explore the positives and negatives of the new technology.
item.description: In this episode we discuss the blockchain and cyrptocurrency craze: What are cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology? We discuss the alternative uses of blockchain and explore the positives and negatives of the new technology.
item.content:encoded: In this episode we discuss the blockchain and cyrptocurrency craze: What are cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology? We discuss the alternative uses of blockchain and explore the positives and negatives of the new technology.

item.itunes:title: Beyonce
item.title: Beyonce
item.itunes:author: Furnisha Lycett, Pouneh Ahari, Marley McIntosh
item.itunes:subtitle: Beyonce
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we discuss all things Beyonce! We challenge the influences that she has had on modern day politics and discuss how this intersects with her popstar image and lifestyle.
item.description: In this episode we discuss all things Beyonce! We challenge the influences that she has had on modern day politics and discuss how this intersects with her popstar image and lifestyle.
item.content:encoded: In this episode we discuss all things Beyonce! We challenge the influences that she has had on modern day politics and discuss how this intersects with her popstar image and lifestyle.

item.itunes:title: Wealth Redistribution
item.title: Wealth Redistribution
item.itunes:author: Furnisha Lycett, Pouneh Ahari, Marley McIntosh
item.itunes:subtitle: Wealth Redistribution
item.itunes:summary: The ever growing wealth gap between rich and poor in the UK is our topic of discussion for this episode. We will be exploring potential options about how to make our society a fairer place for everyone to live.
item.description: The ever growing wealth gap between rich and poor in the UK is our topic of discussion for this episode. We will be exploring potential options about how to make our society a fairer place for everyone to live.
item.content:encoded: The ever growing wealth gap between rich and poor in the UK is our topic of discussion for this episode. We will be exploring potential options about how to make our society a fairer place for everyone to live.
